name: Battle Simulator VR
description:
Wear a VR helmet, place your soldiers, defeat the enemy, or be defeated by the enemy. :p

Players must come up with effective strategies beforehand to defeat hordes of enemies throughout several levels and environments. 
There are now 3 types of soldiers: 
Axe Soldier, 
lance Soldier, 
Archer,
and the next version will provide more soldiers.
